MonsterTrait.Name: Axiomatic Mind
MonsterTrait.Text: The pentadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

MonsterTrait.Name: Disintegration
MonsterTrait.Text: If the pentadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The pentadrone makes five arm attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Arm
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Paralysis Gas (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The pentadrone exhales a 30-foot cone of gas. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
